content: Untested hypothesis: embedding similarity thresholds below 0.3 produce too many false positives for lore deduplication.
Early observation: batch push with 1000 entries completes in under 500ms on SQLite with WAL mode enabled.
Moderate confidence: delta pagination with limit=500 balances response size and round-trip count for typical sync sessions.
Confirmed pattern: using t.TempDir() for test isolation ensures automatic cleanup even when tests panic.
High confidence: idempotency cache with 24h TTL handles all realistic retry windows without excessive storage overhead.
Proven fact: monotonic sequence numbers from SQLite INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT guarantee gap-free ordering for change log entries.
